FuncDef:
The mpls te p2mp-te command enables P2MP MPLS TE.
The undo mpls te p2mp-te command disables P2MP MPLS TE.
By default, P2MP MPLS TE is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable P2MP MPLS TE globally, run the mpls te p2mp-te command in the MPLS view. Run the mpls te p2mp-te command to enable P2MP MPLS TE before you run the mpls te p2mp-mode command to set the MPLS TE tunnel type to P2MP.
Precautions
If the undo mpls te p2mp-te command is run, all P2MP TE LSPs established on the node are torn down.
